subdialogue_text: Hmm, well, there's nothing forlorn about you.
You must be the other Ash, I suppose?

behavior: #0Choose "I am not Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: Well, that's a rotten shame.

behavior: #0Choose "I am not Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: I've been very patient, you see.

behavior: #0Choose "I am not Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: The tales tell of two Ashes, who'll burn Ariandel away.

behavior: #0Choose "I am not Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: And we need only one more...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "I am not Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: Ahh, yes, well...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "I am not Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: I was hoping you might be the other Ash, you see...
Ohh, ohh, finally, you've come!
Oh wondrous Ash, grant us our wish.
Make the tales true, and burn this world away.
My Lady must see flame, and you have only to show her.
You are Ash, are you not? Is it not fire that you seek?

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: Surely you've seen. The rot that afflicts our world.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: But that witch fooled the good Father, and buried the flame.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: After we had all made up our minds, too.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: So, please, grant us one wish.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: Make the tales true, and burn this world away.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: My Lady must see flame, and you have only to show her.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: Oh, please, it must be you.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: I'm so terribly frightened, of timidly rotting away...

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "I am Ash" to the query
subdialogue_text: Like those... Like those fools on the outside.
Ohhh, my, thank you.
I can hear the crackling from here.
The sound of my home, the painting of Ariandel, burning away...
When the world rots, we set it afire. For the sake of the next world.
It's the one thing we do right, unlike those fools on the outside.
Yes, of course, as a burner of worlds should...
Set fire to Ariandel...
Set fire to the rot...
